customerPain.title: Sales Teams Lose Deals Because Manual Work Slows Everything Down
customerPain.description: Manual follow-ups, disconnected tools, and slow response times cause leads to go cold and deals to slip away.

solution.title: One AI Workflow That Manages Your Entire Sales Journey from Lead to Close
solution.description: BoostMyDeal is an AI agent workflow platform that automates lead generation, qualification, outreach, and deal closing by connecting social media, CRMs, phone systems, scheduling tools, video conferencing, and more into a single seamless workflow.

feature1.title: AI-Powered Lead Capture From Social Platforms
feature1.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature2.title: Automated AI Calling Agents — 24/7
feature2.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature3.title: Connect With Any CRM — No Limitations
feature3.description: BoostMyDeal automatically captures and qualifies leads from social media channels, ensuring instant engagement and zero lead leakage.

feature4.title: Native Integration With Business PBX Providers
feature4.description: Connect your trusted PBX or VoIP provider directly to BoostMyDeal for real-time call handling, routing, and analytics.

feature5.title: AI-Driven Scheduling & Video Meetings
feature5.description: Automatically book meetings, Sync with calendars, Launch video calls with integrated conferencing tools.

feature6.title: Intelligent Email Automation That Closes Deals
feature6.description: SMTP email integration, AI email agents follow up automatically, Personalized responses at scale.

highPerformance.title: Built for High-Performance Sales Teams

pricing.title: Simple Plans for Every Sales Team
pricing.description: Flexible pricing designed for teams of every size, from solo founders to enterprise sales operations.

starter.name: Starter
starter.subtitle: Ideal for individuals & small agencies
starter.description: Kickstart your AI sales journey with 300 included minutes of humanlike AI calling, automated email follow-ups, and CRM sync — perfect for solopreneurs and small agencies ready to scale smarter.

growth.name: Growth
growth.subtitle: Ideal for growing teams
growth.description: Scale your sales automation with 1,000 AI minutes, advanced CRM and email integration, and full workflow automation — built for growing teams that want consistent deal flow with less manual work.

pro.name: Pro
pro.subtitle: Ideal for high-performance teams
pro.description: Empower your sales operation with 3,000 AI minutes, deeper analytics, and full AI personalization across calls, emails, and meetings — ideal for high-performing sales organizations running at scale.
features: Full AI personalization across calls, emails & meetings

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.subtitle: Built for large teams & agencies
enterprise.description: Unlock the full power of BoostMyDeal with custom AI models, API access, unlimited users, and dedicated support — tailored for large teams or agencies managing thousands of calls each month.

payAsYouGo.title: Pay-As-You-Go Plan
payAsYouGo.subtitle: Start for free — pay only for what you use.
payAsYouGo.description: Recharge anytime with prepaid credits — no monthly fees, no commitments.
features: Start for free — pay only for what you use
Top-Up Balance: Buy $25, $50, $100, or $500 in BoostMyDeal Credits
Automatic Deduction: Every AI call minute or email follow-up deducts credits in real time
Balance Alerts: System prompts auto-reload when balance drops below $10
Optional Auto-Recharge: Enable auto top-up for seamless operations
